body.p: All image moves in the map view are recorded by darktable. It is then possible to undo or redo such changes to recover a previous state. Note that this undo/redo facility is unlimited while moving images but it is reset each time the map view is left.

The default key shortcuts are:
Ctrl+Z: undo last move
Ctrl+Y: redo last undo (does nothing if undo has not been used yet)
